key.name: auth-trigger
key.description: Toggle to trigger the OAuth flow

key.name: logout-trigger
key.description: Toggle to trigger token cleanup and logout

key.name: authenticated-user
key.description: Display name of the currently logged in Spotify user (empty if not logged in)

key.name: max-text-width
key.description: Maximum width of the lyrics text in pixels before it gets ellipsized

key.name: font-size
key.description: Custom font size in pixels. 0 means use the system default.

key.name: show-icon
key.description: Show a small music icon next to the lyrics text

key.name: panel-position
key.description: Where to place the lyrics on the top bar: left, center, or right

key.name: panel-index
key.description: Position index within the chosen panel section

key.name: show-title-fallback
key.description: Show "Artist â€” Title" when no synced lyrics are available

key.name: hide-when-paused
key.description: Hide the lyrics text when Spotify is paused

key.name: poll-interval
key.description: How often to check Spotify for the current track (3-10 seconds)

key.name: lyrics-offset
key.description: Shift lyrics timing. Negative = lyrics appear later, positive = earlier. Useful if lyrics feel ahead or behind the music.
